org.echo.mobile.framework.service.internal

Class DatabaseApiServiceImpl

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.service.internal.DatabaseApiServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountsService, ApiService, AssetsService, AuthorityAndValidationService, BlocksAndTransactionsService, ContractsService, CustomOperationService, DatabaseApiService, GlobalsService, ObjectsService, SubscriptionService

    public class DatabaseApiServiceImpl
implements DatabaseApiService

    Implementation of interface DatabaseApiService

    Encapsulates logic of preparing API calls to interface SocketCoreComponent

    See Also:
    interface DatabaseApiService, interface SocketCoreComponent

        callback - Async listening result
